name: In The Clear
description: iOS App that allows the user to determine what weather conditions they should expect to experience during their travels.
techStack: Built using Swift; the backend was built using AWS Lambda and NodeJS. The Podfiles used include Google Maps, Google Places, AlamoFire, and SwiftyJSON.

name: In The Clear Web
description: A web app that will give the user all the functionality of the In The Clear iOS app.
techStack: Built using ReactJS, Bootstrap, NodeJS, ExpressJS, AWS Lambda, AWS ECS/EC2 and MongoDB. Like the iOS app, Google Maps and Google Places will be used.

name: Personal Website
description: A website that shows what I've done both professionally and in my free time.
techStack: Built using ReactJS, Bootstrap, NodeJS, and Netlify Functions.
